title: Creole chicken in the slow cooker
ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'Cajun seasoning to taste', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 stalk celery, diced', '1 green pepper, diced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 onion, diced', '100g (4 oz) mushrooms, sliced', '1 fresh green chilli, seeded and chopped']
